content:
[Wisconsin Senate 2022 | Fox Valley (Outagamie County - Appleton) | P1: M, 52, Paper mill supervisor, Kimberly, union member but "not a straight-ticket guy"]
Q: Thanks everyone for joining us. Let's start with how the economy is affecting you here in the Fox Valley.
"The paper industry is what built this valley. Good union jobs. My dad worked at the mill, I work at the mill. But it's changing. Automation, competition from overseas. The future feels uncertain."
participant_profile: M, 52, Paper mill supervisor, Kimberly, union member but "not a straight-ticket guy"
preceding_moderator_q: Thanks everyone for joining us. Let's start with how the economy is affecting you here in the Fox Valley.
content_original: The paper industry is what built this valley. Good union jobs. My dad worked at the mill, I work at the mill. But it's changing. Automation, competition from overseas. The future feels uncertain.

content:
[Wisconsin Senate 2022 | Fox Valley (Outagamie County - Appleton) | P5: M, 59, Retired plant manager (Kimberly-Clark), Neenah, fiscally conservative]
Q: Thanks everyone for joining us. Let's start with how the economy is affecting you here in the Fox Valley.
"I spent 35 years at Kimberly-Clark. Saw the good times and the changes. The valley has adapted - we've got healthcare, insurance, some tech. But manufacturing is still the heart and it's under pressure."
participant_profile: M, 59, Retired plant manager (Kimberly-Clark), Neenah, fiscally conservative
preceding_moderator_q: Thanks everyone for joining us. Let's start with how the economy is affecting you here in the Fox Valley.
content_original: I spent 35 years at Kimberly-Clark. Saw the good times and the changes. The valley has adapted - we've got healthcare, insurance, some tech. But manufacturing is still the heart and it's under pressure.

content:
[Wisconsin Senate 2022 | Fox Valley (Outagamie County - Appleton) | P9: M, 33, Warehouse logistics coordinator, Oshkosh, young family, cost of living stressed]
Q: Thanks everyone for joining us. Let's start with how the economy is affecting you here in the Fox Valley.
"I'm 33, trying to raise a family. My wife and I both work. Daycare is $1,500 a month. Groceries are insane. Gas to get to work. We're not getting ahead, we're treading water."
participant_profile: M, 33, Warehouse logistics coordinator, Oshkosh, young family, cost of living stressed
preceding_moderator_q: Thanks everyone for joining us. Let's start with how the economy is affecting you here in the Fox Valley.
content_original: I'm 33, trying to raise a family. My wife and I both work. Daycare is $1,500 a month. Groceries are insane. Gas to get to work. We're not getting ahead, we're treading water.

content:
[Wisconsin Senate 2022 | Fox Valley (Outagamie County - Appleton) | P4: F, 47, School bus driver, Little Chute, part-time work, economic anxieties]
Q: Thanks everyone for joining us. Let's start with how the economy is affecting you here in the Fox Valley.
"I drive a school bus. Part-time, no benefits. I do it to help make ends meet while my husband works at the foundry. The inflation has been brutal on us."

content:
[Wisconsin Senate 2022 | Fox Valley (Outagamie County - Appleton) | P1: M, 52, Paper mill supervisor, Kimberly, union member but "not a straight-ticket guy"]

"Automation is changing everything. The mill has fewer workers than when my dad was there. Machines do more. That's the trend."
